comments:
The following is the use case:
1) Import the attached project to create the starting configuration.
2) Select ottawa.extlibrary and open it with the ?EMF Workbench ExtLibrary Model Editor? (not the default editor).
3) Expand ?Library Ottawa Public Library?.
4) Choose the "New Child -> Borrower" action from the context menu.
5) Set the new Borrower's first name to "John" by clicking on the name field
6) Now click on the last name field.

Result: Following exception is logged
